text: The ambience was relaxed and comfortable. I opted for the “Build My Own Bowl” and the ingredients were fresh. Everything tasted clean and well-prepared. Highly recommend for a casual and satisfying bite!
The Xmas mini buffet takeaway was a huge hit with my friends and me. Every dish was incredibly flavorful and we all loved it. We're already looking forward to ordering again soon!

Highly recommend to get the mini buffet for home or small office parties, food was excellent and it was very well prepared - and you don’t have to worry about utensils as they provided everything. Definitely will order again for future house parties, healthy and delicious!

Ordered CNY mini buffet for reunion!

Food & beverages were great. Served fast upon ordering. It’s our 2nd visit. First visit was only having a drink. Staffs were very friendly. Quality food. Can be a bit noisy if there’s big group. Otherwise, it’s a nice environment, with outdoor sitting as well.

I had the pleasure of dining at Smol Café & Salad Bar, and it was nothing short of delightful! I tried the Salmon Says and Make No Misteak, and both dishes left a lasting impression.

The Salmon Says was an absolute standout. The salmon was perfectly cooked—crispy on the outside, tender and juicy on the inside. Paired with their vibrant and fresh salad, the dish was well-balanced, light, and flavorful. The combination of textures and the tangy dressing brought everything together beautifully.

The Make No Misteak was equally impressive. The steak was cooked to perfection—tender, flavorful, and juicy, just the way I like it. The accompaniments elevated the dish, with the greens adding a refreshing crunch and the dressing tying it all together.

What I loved most about Smol Café is the attention to detail and the focus on fresh, quality ingredients. The cozy atmosphere and friendly service make it a spot I’ll definitely return to. Whether you’re craving something healthy or indulgent, Smol Café is a must-visit!
